{{cpp/title|tuple_size{{small|&lt;std::tuple&gt;}}}}
{{cpp/utility/tuple/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=tuple|since=c++11|
template&lt; class... Types &gt;
struct tuple_size&lt; std::tuple&lt;Types...&gt; &gt;
    : std::integral_constant&lt;std::size_t, sizeof...(Types)&gt; { };
}}

Provides access to the number of elements in a tuple as a compile-time constant expression.

===Helper variable template===
{{ddcl|since=c++17|1=
template&lt; class T &gt;
constexpr std::size_t tuple_size_v = tuple_size&lt;T&gt;::value;
}}

{{cpp/types/integral_constant/inherit2|{{tt|sizeof...(Types)}}|std::size_t}}

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;tuple&gt;

template &lt;class T&gt;
void test(T value)
{
    int a[std::tuple_size_v&lt;T&gt;]; // can be used at compile time

    std::cout &lt;&lt; std::tuple_size&lt;T&gt;{} &lt;&lt; ' ' // or at run time
              &lt;&lt; sizeof a &lt;&lt; ' '
              &lt;&lt; sizeof value &lt;&lt; '\n';
}

int main()
{
    test(std::make_tuple(1, 2, 3.14));
}
|p=true
|output=3 12 16
}}
